mapper.select: SELECT A.code_nm, b.manage_no, a.code from cmmn_code_manage A, eqpmn_manage B WHERE A.code = B.eqpmn_code (+) AND a.group_code NOT IN ('HODITYPE') AND A.group_code IN ('EQP1') GROUP BY A.code_nm
SELECT b.use_place from cmmn_code_manage A, eqpmn_manage B WHERE A.code = B.eqpmn_code (+) AND a.group_code NOT IN ('HODITYPE') AND b.use_place NOT IN ('null') GROUP BY b.use_place
SELECT A.code_nm, A.group_code FROM cmmn_code_manage a WHERE a.group_code IN ('EQP1')
mapper.update: MERGE INTO pmseqpmn A USING DUAL ON A.manage_no = #{manageno} WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.code_nm = #{codenm}, A.eqpmn_code = #{eqpmncode}, A.purchs_date = #{purchsdate}, A.purchs_amount = #{purchsamount}, A.pern_no = #{pernno}, A.disuse_yn = #{disuseyn}, A.use_place = #{useplace}, A.remark = #{remark} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (manage_no, code_nm, eqpmn_code, purchs_date, purchs_amount, pern_no, disuse_yn, use_place, remark) VALUES (eqpmn_seq.NEXT_VALUE, #{codenm}, #{eqpmncode}, #{purchsdate}, #{purchsamount}, #{pernno}, #{disuseyn}, #{useplace}, #{remark})
